page.title: 14COMPUTERS IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: In recent years computers have become very popular in Dalbeattie.It probably started off when adults bought their children computers for presents.Most children learn a great deal playing games on them.They get great enjoyment out of playing such games. Every school in the region has at least one computer in it provided partly from school funds and partly by the local authority.There are many programmes available in most subjects, including maths,geography and problem solving.Children are becoming quite expert in using them. Even in local businesses there are computers involved.All the banks and the finance company have a computer as well as the library, the factories and the sawmill.
